main_definition: The process of gradual development or change over time, often used to describe biological species' adaptation through natural selection.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adaptation and progress in a particular field
meanings_and_examples.example: The evolution of technology has greatly improved our quality of life.
Human societies have evolved significantly since the advent of agriculture.
The evolution of species is a fundamental concept in understanding biodiversity on Earth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Growth or transformation into something better or more advanced
meanings_and_examples.example: Many businesses undergo an organizational evolution to adapt and compete effectively.
